name: Drone Transport
description: A drone with transport capability is requested to transport a package from A to B

name: Drone inspection
description: A drone with high resolution camera is requested to inspect a wind power plant at human unaccessable areas for potential maintenance / damage

name: Mobility as a service
description: A manned or autonomous vehicle is requested to transport a given number of persons from A to B

name: EV Charging
description: A manned or autonomous vehicle is requesting an available EV chaging slot at a nearby location or along a future route/location

name: Drone connectivity provision
description: A drone with a mobile network connectivity equipment, e.g., WiFi access point is requested to cover a specific location in order to provide connectivity

name: Power source
description: A network equipment, that consumes a give amount of energy can be powered with renewable sources provided e.g., by a solar panel

name: Cell tower rent
description: A virtual mobile network operator, MVNO, request access to a cell tower in a given area to provide connectivity to its customers

name: Sensor Data
description: An industrial plant equipped with sensors offering the access to the sensor data during a certain window in time.
